segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen, where two children are up to something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is balanced precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching into an open cabinet, specifically into a jar labeled “COOKIE JAR.”
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little body is stretched, and the stool looks incredibly unstable beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see its legs are splayed, almost as if it’s about to tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me incredibly anxious to see him like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With one hand, he's grabbing cookies, and the other holds a plate—perhaps to catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands nearby, hand outstretched, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are working together on this secret mission, I can tell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The audacity of them, completely out of sight of the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't give way; he could really hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mischievous pair, planning their cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a risky endeavor for a few cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
